title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Policy 2 - Representative Offices of Foreign Banking Corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Policy 2 - Representative Offices of Foreign Banking Corporations

State Regulations
§ 2.1 - General, version 3
§ 2.2 - Definitions, version 3
§ 2.3 - Permissible activities, version 2
§ 2.4 - Other activities, version 2
§ 2.5 - Prior notice for regional administrative offices, version 2
§ 2.6 - Prior notice for foreign banking corporations with branch or agency, version 2
§ 2.7 - Exemption from licensing and prior notice procedure for establishment of office performing limited administrative function, version 2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Policy 2

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §221-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
